mapper.select: SELECT id, name, share, code, amm, noDay, noHour FROM Share_ths_ai_detail t WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT noDay,noHour FROM Share_ths_ai_detail t1 WHERE id =(SELECT max(id) FROM Share_ths_ai_detail)) t2 WHERE t.noHour = t2.noHour AND t.noDay=t2.noDay) order by name,amm
SELECT * FROM () select name, share, code ,sum(1) as num from Share_ths_ai_detail where noDay >= ${noDay} group by name, share, code ) ORDER BY num
